artist: Artist: Utagawa Kunisada; Publisher: Jōshūya Kinzō
creditline: Bequest of Louis W. Hill, Jr.
inscription: Names of characters written aside each figure; right panel: {Chichibu no sho_ji Shigetada, Ema Koshiro_ Yoshitoki, Wada Taro_ Yoshimori} | center panel: {Akushichihyo_e Kagekiyo, Shigetada imo_to} (younger sister of Shigetada) {Kinugasa} | left panel: {Kagekiyo tsuma} (the wife of Kagekiyo) {Akoya, Chibanosuke Tsunetane, Ho_jo_Shiro_ Tokimasa}
markings: red artist\'s toshidama seal | censor seals: {Mutata} | {Mera} | {shitauri} | publisher\'s seal:
medium: Woodblock print (nishiki-e); ink and color on paper
signed: right:  豊國画 {Toyokuni ga} | center: 一陽齋豊國画 {Ichiyōsai Toyokuni ga} | left:  香蝶楼豊國画 {Kōchōrō Toyokuni ga}
title: (Scene from the Kabuki Play "Dan no ura kabuto gunki")
